item.description: Something for everyone...basic beginner through experienced and couples. Workshop/lessons 10 am to 4 pm. Michelle Jackson and Karen Heyes instructors. Register on or before October 30. Registration form may be downloaded from dance@midnightrodeobar.com or www.midnightrodeobar.com. Form may also be picked up at the Saturday night dance. Package deals available. $38 for workshop, $48 for workshop and buffet lunch put on by the Yard Restaurant, Pkg 2 (the works) $73 for workshop, buffet lunch, dinner and evening dancing (Country Felix is the band);. Make it a weekend by staying at the Best Western next door for $69 room. Gotta reserve the room by October 28. LIMITED SPACE, DON'T WAIT!
item.name: Country Dance Workshop
